    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2976</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Transport- How it was humanly possible?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Transport, wie es menschlich möglich war?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le transport comment c'était humainement 
possible ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O transporte como era humana possível?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il trasporto come era umanemente possibile?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μεταφορά - πώς αυτό ήταν ανθρώπινα δυνατός;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿El transporte cómo era humano posible?</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These lesson plans are intended to investigate the incredible question o "The Transport and " How it was humanly possible?"The student will analyze and learn the different roles, motivations and patterns of conduct of individuals who were involved.They will learn of different agencies and bureaucracies involved in the complex organizational aspects.including state created boides such as the SS, and will discuss the relevancy of these issues to us today
Lessonplan is available to download and print.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Holocaust survivors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">world war II</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">jewish life</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">concentration camps</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">transport</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">totilatarians states</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">SS</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">testimonials</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektionpläne sollen die unglaubliche Frage O 
nachforschen "der Transport und", wie es menschlich possible?"The 
Kursteilnehmer analysiert war und die unterschiedlichen Rollen, die 
Beweggründe und die Muster der Führung der Einzelpersonen zu 
erlernen, die involved.They waren, von den unterschiedlichen Agenturen
und von den Bürokratien erlernt, die in die komplizierter 
organisatorischer aspects.including Zustand erstellten boides wie die 
SS mit einbezogen werden, und die Bedeutung dieser Ausgaben zu uns 
todayLessonplan ist vorhanden zu downloaden und zu drucken behandelt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces plans de leçon sont destinés pour étudier la 
question incroyable o "le transport et" comment c'était humainement 
étudiant de possible?"The analysera et apprendre les différents 
rôles, motivations et configurations de la conduite des individus qui
étaient involved.They apprendra de différentes agences et de 
bureaucraties impliquées dans les boides créés par état 
d'organisation complexe d'aspects.including tels que les solides 
solubles, et discutera la pertinence de ces issues avec nous 
todayLessonplan est disponible pour télécharger et imprimer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas plantas da lição são pretendidas investigar a 
pergunta incredible o "o transporte e" como era humana estudante do 
possible?"The analisará e para aprender os papéis, os motivations e 
os testes padrões diferentes da conduta dos indivíduos que eram 
involved.They aprenderá de agências diferentes e das burocracias 
envolvidas nos boides criados de aspects.including estado 
organizational complexo tais como os SS, e discutirá a relevância 
destas edições a nós todayLessonplan está disponível download e 
imprimir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi programmi di lezione sono intesi per studiare la 
domanda incredibile o "il trasporto e" come era umanemente allievo del
possible?"The analizzerà ed imparare i ruoli, le motivazioni ed i 
modelli differenti di comportamento degli individui che erano 
involved.They imparerà delle agenzie differenti e delle burocrazie 
addette al aspects.including organizzativo complesso dichiarano i
boides creati quali gli ss e discuteranno l'attinenza di queste 
edizioni con noi todayLessonplan è a disposizione trasferire e 
stampare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα σχέδια μαθήματος προορίζονται να ερευνήσουν 
την απίστευτη ερώτηση ο "η μεταφορά και" πώς ήταν ανθρώπινα ο 
σπουδαστής possible?"The θα αναλύσει και θα μάθει τους 
διαφορετικούς ρόλους, τα κίνητρα και τα πρότυπα της συμπεριφοράς 
των ατόμων που περιλήφθηκαν Θα μάθουν των διαφορετικών 
αντιπροσωπειών και των γραφειοκρατιών που συμμετέχουν στο σύνθετο 
οργανωτικό κράτος aspects.including που δημιουργείται boides 
όπως το SS, και θα συζητήσουν τη σχετικότητα αυτών των 
ζητημάτων σε μας todayLessonplan είναι διαθέσιμοι για να 
μεταφορτώσουν και να τυπώσουν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estos planes de la lección se piensan para investigar la 
pregunta increíble o "el transporte y" cómo era estudiante del 
possible?"The analizará humano y aprender los diversos papeles, 
motivaciones y modelos de la conducta de los individuos que eran 
involved.They aprenderá de diversas agencias y de burocracias 
implicadas en los boides creados estado de organización complejo de 
aspects.including tales como los SS, y discutirá la importancia de 
estas ediciones a nosotros todayLessonplan está disponible descargar 
y para imprimir.</string>
          </description>
